Articles.Content: Did you make a thread specifically for one pun?
This is why status updates should be a thing.

To the spess lounge with you.

> To the spess lounge with you.

Off-topic: I love that game in the image. Angry bird + RPG + activation mechanics. Lots of fun.

> 
> Off-topic: I love that game in the image. Angry bird + RPG + activation mechanics. Lots of fun.

Delete this because goldcrests.

> 
> **Anything will fly, if you throw it hard enough.**

No signature could be more appropriate.

> 
> To the spess lounge with you.

"spess"?

I like you.

We're friends now.
